mapper.update: update sys_region set region_name = #{regionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, region_short_name = #{regionShortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, region_code = #{regionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, region_parent_id = #{regionParentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, region_level = #{regionLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER} where region_id = #{regionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select region_id, region_name, region_short_name, region_code, region_parent_id, region_level from sys_region where region_id = #{regionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select region_id, region_name, region_short_name, region_code, region_parent_id, region_level from sys_region
select region_id,region_name,region_code from sys_region where region_parent_id =#{regionParentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
